p: The FF study population included individuals from 10 FF communities [ 13, 19, 37, 38, 39] as shown in Figure 1. Individuals were approached in community health facilities (CHF) or during voluntary counselling and testing (VCT) campaigns, and were eligible to participate if they had an HIV-1 positive status and were at least 18 years old (FF communities 1–8) or 14 years (FF communities 9–10).
